Text.Page:
The good news is that there's a regular crew down here. That means any given {@LinkCreature:11#1001#Red Lash bosun} or {@LinkCreature:11#2006#raider} probably saw your dementalith when they were moving it around.

Now pirates don't usually talk, even under interrogation. Something about a black spot.

But challenge a few of 'em. Maybe you'll get lucky.

These were on their bodies? Why would they chip away parts of the magic stone? Unless...

Unless carrying a chip from the dementalith protects you from exposure to its power.

I think you're going to have to go right to the top, : Orless, the Red Lash pirate captain.
{@LinkCreature:11#1001#Red Lash bosuns} and {@LinkCreature:11#2006#raiders} probably have information on the dementalith...if anyone does.
